00036 class U_EXPORT UClient_Base {
00037 public:
00038 
00039         // Check for memory error
00040         U_MEMORY_TEST
00041 
00042         // Allocator e Deallocator
00043         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00044         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00045 
00046         // SERVICES
00047 
00048         static UString* str_RES_TIMEOUT;
00049 
00050         static void str_allocate();
00051 
00052         bool isClosed() const
00053                 {
00054                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::isClosed()")
00055 
00056                 bool result = socket->isClosed();
00057 
00058                 U_RETURN(result);
00059                 }
00060 
00061         bool isConnected() const
00062                 {
00063                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::isConnected()")
00064 
00065                 bool result = socket->isConnected();
00066 
00067                 U_RETURN(result);
00068                 }
00069 
00070         bool isHttps() const
00071                 {
00072                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::isHttps()")
00073 
00074                 if (Url::str_https == 0) Url::str_allocate();
00075 
00076                 bool result = (UClient_Base::service == *Url::str_https);
00077 
00078                 U_RETURN(result);
00079                 }
00080 
00081         void reset()
00082                 {
00083                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::reset()")
00084 
00085                 request.clear();
00086                 }
00087 
00088         void close()
00089                 {
00090                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::close()")
00091 
00092                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(socket)
00093 
00094                 socket->close();
00095                 }
00096 
00097         int                     getPort() const                 { return port; }
00098         UString         getServer() const                       { return server; }
00099         UString         getBuffer() const                       { return buffer; }
00100         UString         getResponse() const             { return response; }
00101         const char* getResponseData() const { return response.data(); }
00102 
00103         void logResponse(const UString& data);
00104         void loadConfigParam(UFileConfig& file);
00105         bool setHostPort(const UString& host, int port);

00116         void clearData();

00118         bool readResponse(int count = U_SINGLE_READ);
00119 
00120         bool sendRequest();
00121         bool sendRequest(const UString& data)                            { request =                    data;                   return sendRequest(); }
00122         bool sendRequest(const char* data, uint32_t len) { request = UString(data, len); return sendRequest(); }
00123 
00124         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00125         // Very simple RPC-like layer
00126         //
00127         // Requests and responses are build of little packets each containing a 4-byte ascii token, an 8-byte hex value or length,
00128         // and optionally data corresponding to the length.
00129         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 
00131         // Transmit token name (4 characters) and value (32-bit int, as 8 hex characters)
00132 
00133         bool sendTokenInt(const char* token, uint32_t value)
00134                 { buffer.setEmpty(); return URPC::sendTokenInt(socket, token, value, buffer); }
00135 
00136         // Write a token, and then the string data
00137 
00138         bool sendTokenString(const char* token, const UString& data)
00139                 { buffer.setEmpty(); return URPC::sendTokenString(socket, token, data, buffer); }
00140 
00141         // Transmit an vector of string
00142 
00143         bool sendTokenVector(const char* token, UVector<UString>& vec)
00144                 { buffer.setEmpty(); return URPC::sendTokenVector(socket, token, vec, buffer); }
00145 
00146         // Read a token and value
00147 
00148         bool readTokenInt(const char* token)
00149                 { response.setEmpty(); return (URPC::readTokenInt(socket, token, response) > 0); }
00150 
00151         // Read a token, and then the string data
00152 
00153         bool readTokenString(const char* token)
00154                 {
00155                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::readTokenString(%S)", token)
00156 
00157                 // NB: we force for U_SUBSTR_INC_REF case (string can be referenced more)...
00158 
00159                   buffer.setEmptyForce();
00160                 response.setEmptyForce();
00161 
00162                 if (URPC::readTokenString(socket, token, buffer, response))
00163                         {
00164                         // NB: we force for U_SUBSTR_INC_REF case (string can be referenced more)...
00165 
00166                         buffer.size_adjust_force(U_TOKEN_NM);
00167 
00168                         U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer = %.*S response = %.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(response))
00169 
00170                         U_RETURN(true);
00171                         }
00172 
00173                 U_RETURN(false);
00174                 }
00175 
00176         bool readRPCResponse()
00177                 {
00178                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::readRPCResponse()")
00179 
00180                 bool result = (this->readTokenString(0) || this->UClient_Base::buffer.empty() == false); 
00181 
00182                 U_RETURN(result);
00183                 }
00184 
00185         // Read an vector of string from the network
00186 
00187         bool readTokenVector(const char* token, UVector<UString>& vec)
00188                 { response.setEmpty(); return URPC::readTokenVector(socket, token, response, vec); }
00189 
00190         // DEBUG
00191 
00192 #ifdef DEBUG
00193         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00194 #endif
00195 
00196 protected:
00197         USocket* socket;
00198 
00199         int port,                               // the port number to connect to
00200                  verify_mode;           // mode of verification of connection
00201         uint32_t        timeoutMS;      // the time-out value in milliseconds. A zero value indicates that the client will wait forever,
00202                                                                 // or until the underlying operating system decides that the connection cannot be established
00203 
00204         UString server,         // host name or ip address for server
00205                           cert_file,    // locations for certificate of client
00206                           key_file,             // locations for private key of client
00207                           password,             // password  for private key of client
00208                           ca_file,              // locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00209                           ca_path,              // locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00210                           log_file,    // locations for file log
00211                           request,
00212                           response,
00213                           buffer,
00214                           service,
00215                           host_port,
00216                           logbuf;
00217 
00218         bool bIPv6;
00219 
00220         static ULog* log;
00221         static bool log_shared_with_server;
00222 
00223         bool setUrl(const UString& newLocation);
00224 
00225         // COSTRUTTORI
00226 
00227          UClient_Base(UFileConfig* cfg);
00228         ~UClient_Base();
00229 
00230 private:
00231         UClient_Base(const UClient_Base&)                               {}
00232         UClient_Base& operator=(const UClient_Base&) { return *this; }
00233 
00234         friend class UFCGIPlugIn;
00235 };
00236 
00237 template <class Socket> class U_EXPORT UClient : virtual public UClient_Base {
00238 public:
00239 
00240         // COSTRUTTORI
00241 
00242         UClient(UFileConfig* cfg) : UClient_Base(cfg)
00243                 {
00244                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClient, "%p", cfg)
00245 
00246                 socket = U_NEW(Socket(bIPv6));
00247                 }
00248 
00249         ~UClient()
00250                 {
00251                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClient)
00252                 }
00253 
00254         Socket* getSocket() { return (Socket*) socket; }
00255 
00256         // DEBUG
00257 
00258 #ifdef DEBUG
00259         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UClient_Base::dump(reset); }
00260 #endif
00261 
00262 private:
00263         UClient(const UClient&) : UClient_Base(0) {}
00264         UClient& operator=(const UClient&)        { return *this; }
00265 };
00266 
00267 #ifdef HAVE_SSL // specializzazione con USSLSocket
00268 
00269 template <> class U_EXPORT UClient<USSLSocket> : virtual public UClient_Base {
00270 public:
00271 
00272         UClient(UFileConfig* cfg) : UClient_Base(cfg)
00273                 {
00274                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClient<USSLSocket>, "%p", cfg)
00275 
00276                 USSLSocket::method = (SSL_METHOD*) SSLv3_client_method();
00277 
00278                 socket = U_NEW(USSLSocket(bIPv6));
00279 
00280                 // These are the 1024 bit DH parameters from "Assigned Number for SKIP Protocols"
00281                 // (http://www.skip-vpn.org/spec/numbers.html).
00282                 // See there for how they were generated.
00283 
00284                 getSocket()->useDHFile();
00285 
00286                 // Load our certificate
00287 
00288                 if (getSocket()->setContext(cert_file.c_str(), key_file.c_str(), password.c_str(),
00289                                                                                                 ca_file.c_str(),  ca_path.c_str(), verify_mode) == false)
00290                         {
00291                         U_ERROR("SSL setContext() failed...", 0);
00292                         }
00293                 }
00294 
00295         ~UClient()
00296                 {
00297                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClient<USSLSocket>)
00298                 }
00299 
00300         USSLSocket* getSocket() { return (USSLSocket*) socket; }
00301 
00302         // DEBUG
00303 
00304 #ifdef DEBUG
00305         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UClient_Base::dump(reset); }
00306 #endif
00307 
00308 private:
00309         UClient<USSLSocket>(const UClient<USSLSocket>&) : UClient_Base(0) {}
00310         UClient<USSLSocket>& operator=(const UClient<USSLSocket>&)                      { return *this; }
00311 };
00312 
00313 #endif
00314 
00315 #endif
